title: Catena-X Data Participant
description: The catena-x participant is the standard role inside the catena-x network. Companies sharing and receviing data as well as using service provider offers and app offers are usually 'participants' - active members of the network.

providers.title: Catena-X Marketplace
providers.description: The CX marketplace(s) are separated between apps and services. Both the marketplaces offer customer oriented offers to enable the customer to participate inside the network as well as support the daily business by use case specific business applications.

detailsWithImageRow1.title: App Marketplace
detailsWithImageRow1.description: The app marketplace offers use case driven business applications.

detailsWithImageRow1.title: Service Marketplace
detailsWithImageRow1.description: Service offerings to enable CX members to participate in the dataspace.
